caption: Table 2: (Uplink) communication complexity in number of reals to reach e-accuracy for linearly-converging algorithms allowing for CC, with an optimal choice of unbiased compressors. We provide the leading asymptotic factor and ignore log factors such as log e⁻¹. The state of the art is highlighted in green.
description: This table compares the communication complexity (in terms of the number of real numbers communicated) of various linearly-converging algorithms that employ communication compression (CC).  The algorithms are evaluated with an optimal selection of unbiased compressors. The table highlights the leading asymptotic factor in the complexity, ignoring logarithmic factors. The state-of-the-art algorithms are indicated in green.
